p.k: Gumball and Darwin cheat on their maths test, get detention and have to escape. / Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of a trash can war between Richard and Mr. Robinson. / Gumball tries to look good in the school photo. / Richard overhears Gumball and Darwin making fun of him, which hurts his feelings and he has to regain his reputation as a hero. / Gumball and Darwin try to get a game back from Tobias, but Darwin starts to feel like a sidekick to Gumball and refuses to follow his orders. / Darwin kisses Penny in one of Gumball's dreams and gets mad. / Gumball destroys Alan and Carmen's relationship and has to reunite them. / Gumball and Darwin rent a film called "A Pony's Tail" to watch with Anais, but keep getting distracted on their way home. / Granny JoJo's overprotective behavior puts the Wattersons in danger.
